hero.shield: The World's Largest Real Estate Investment Association
hero.subtitle: We manage the world's largest joint portfolio for Large Capital: +3,000 off-market assets and the best agencies from +50 countries united in a single alliance.

legacy.title: The Most Powerful Alliance
legacy.text1: Urbina Agency is not just an agency; it is the nexus of the global real estate elite. We have created the largest collaboration network to offer investors what no one else has: total access.
legacy.text2: We centralize the supply of top agencies from 50 countries. If it exists and is profitable, we have it.
legacy.secrets_text: A single gateway to thousands of confidential assets across the planet.
legacy.success_text: By representing the largest volume of capital, we secure the best conditions.

footer.title: FOR INVESTORS
footer.description: The world authority in high-value real estate asset management.

seo.title: For Investors | World's Largest Real Estate Investment Association
seo.description: Access +3,000 off-market assets in 50 countries. +500 Hotels, Land, and Luxury. Exclusively for Large Capital under strict Proof of Funds (POF).

search.title: Global Asset Search
search.subtitle: Track our joint portfolio of +3,000 opportunities in 50 countries.
search.results_found: We have detected exclusive opportunities in
search.cta_text: Our assets are protected. Complete the form and provide your Proof of Funds (POF) to receive confidential offers from this area in your email.
search.no_results: No public results. Contact us to activate our global network.

inversiones.title: Real Estate Investments (+3,000 Assets)
inversiones.description: The largest global investment portfolio. We detect high-yield opportunities in over 50 markets.
inversiones.longDescription: As the world's largest investment association, we centralize the best opportunities from hundreds of local agencies. No matter where you seek profitability: we have the asset and the local partner to execute the operation with total legal and financial security.
inversiones.details: Global Strategies: Core, Value-Add, and Opportunistic.
features: Access to assets in 50 countries with a single call.
High-level standardized Due Diligence.
Structuring of cross-border investment vehicles.
Global scale post-acquisition Asset Management.

hoteles.title: Hotels for Sale (+500 Available)
hoteles.description: The world's largest selection of hotels. Over 500 off-market assets in major global tourist hubs.
hoteles.longDescription: No one has more hotels than us. By joining forces with local specialists in every tourist destination, we offer everything from boutique hotels in Paris to resorts in the Caribbean or Maldives. If you are looking to buy a hotel, we are your only necessary stop.
hoteles.details: Management, franchise, or pure purchase opportunities globally.
features: Portfolio of +500 hotels in Europe, Americas, and Asia.
Direct access to hotel chains and family offices.
Sale & Leaseback opportunities with top operators.
Luxury resorts in emerging and consolidated destinations.

terrenos.title: Land for Sale (Global Portfolio)
terrenos.description: Finalist and large-scale development land in strategic locations across 5 continents.
terrenos.longDescription: For large developers, land is the raw material. Our global alliance allows us to offer finalist land in the world's fastest-growing markets, verified by local urban planning experts.
terrenos.details: Residential, logistics, and tertiary land worldwide.
features: Land banks in urban expansion zones.
Logistics land in major world transport hubs.
Prime coastal tourism developments.
Comprehensive urban management in any jurisdiction.

lujo.title: Luxury Properties (+1,000 Villas)
lujo.description: The most exclusive collection of Prime villas and penthouses in the world's most desired cities.
lujo.longDescription: From Monaco to Miami, Dubai to Marbella. We have gathered the most exclusive properties from the world's best luxury agencies into a single portfolio. Access what no one else sees.
features: Designer villas in elite gated communities.
Trophy penthouses in New York, London, and Singapore.
Historic estates and castles in Europe.
Global concierge service for the buyer.

bodegas.title: Wineries & Vineyards (World Selection)
bodegas.description: Investments in the most prestigious terroirs: France, Spain, Italy, California, and New Worlds.
bodegas.longDescription: Wine is a global asset. Our association includes agronomy and enology experts from the best wine regions. Buy a winery in Bordeaux or a vineyard in Mendoza with the assurance of the best local advice.
bodegas.details: Productive assets with international brand value.
features: Wineries in Premier Grand Cru regions.
Intensive production vineyards in the New World.
Profitable wine hotels and wine tourism projects.
Brands with ready-to-export distribution.

faqs_subtitle: Everything you need to know before investing with the Largest Global Association.

faqs.question: What is this Global Association?
faqs.answer: We are the union of the best boutique investment agencies from over 50 countries. We have centralized our portfolios to offer large investors a single point of access to the entire global off-market.

faqs.question: Why is Proof of Funds (POF) MANDATORY?
faqs.answer: We handle critical information regarding billions of euros in assets. To receive the dossier and email offers, proving financial capacity is essential. No POF, no information.

faqs.question: How do I receive investment offers?
faqs.answer: Once your profile and POF are verified, our system will automatically email you opportunities that fit your criteria in your selected zones.

faqs.question: Do I have to pay commissions to multiple agencies?
faqs.answer: No. You deal only with us as your single point of contact. We manage agreements with local partners internally.

contact_global.title: Access Request & POF
contact_global.subtitle: Complete the form and attach your POF to receive confidential dossiers.
contact_global.explanation: To protect our sellers' confidentiality. We only share sensitive information with verified buyers.
